seo.title: About Diego Rodriguez - Senior Full-Stack & AI Engineer
seo.description: Learn about Diego Rodriguez, a Senior Full-Stack & AI Engineer with 9+ years of experience building AI-powered systems, LLM orchestration, RAG pipelines, ML-driven risk detection, and algorithmic trading with reinforcement learning. Currently building AI-integrated SaaS products with dynamic content generation and intelligent recommendation engines.
seo.keywords: diego rodriguez about, senior full stack AI engineer, LLM orchestration, RAG pipelines, prompt engineering, AI agent systems, machine learning, reinforcement learning, PyTorch, Python, TypeScript, FastAPI, algorithmic trading, risk detection, AI SaaS developer, software engineer uruguay

heading: Bridging <accent>AI</accent> with real-world products.
bio: Senior Full-Stack Engineer with 9+ years designing, building, and deploying production-grade applications across fintech, real-time platforms, and AI-powered systems. Specialized in bridging AI/ML capabilities with real-world products, from LLM orchestration and RAG pipelines to ML-driven risk detection and algorithmic trading systems powered by reinforcement learning.
